jMusicMetaManager.gui

Class ProcessingProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • mckay.utilities.gui.progressbars.DoubleProgressBarTaskMonitor
      • jMusicMetaManager.gui.ProcessingProgressBar

  • public class ProcessingProgressBar
extends mckay.utilities.gui.progressbars.DoubleProgressBarTaskMonitor
    Monitors, updates and coordinates a DoubleProgressBarDialog progress bar and oversees processing. An error message is generated if a problem occurs during processing. Tasks may be cancelled.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class mckay.utilities.gui.progressbars.DoubleProgressBarTaskMonitor
